title: strange league client bug
body:
running the league client causes the monitor resolution to set to 600 x 480 and causes the league client to shrink. annoying, but not really urgent, though would appreciate a permanent fix. started today when the league client shortcut got the shield thing next to it that causes administrator permission to be needed to run the thing.
using windows 10, nvidia. can provide screenshots if you need it.
sometimes causes post game to show up in a little rectangle and forces a task manager shutdown

replies.body:
It sounds like your config might be messed up. Try following these steps: navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config... Delete *game.cfg* and *persistedsettings.json*. Then would suggest running a [Hextech repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) which should find any files that are corrupted and get you fixed up! Last, but not least make sure to check your video drivers to see if they are up to date as well. 

Let me know if you run into any issues after and i'll be sure to try and help out.
